items.title:
BE ALL THAT YOU
CAN BE
items.author: John Doe
items.excerpt: All were welcomed with joyful cries.  Phileas Fogg distributed the reward he had promised to the soldiers, while Passepartout, not without reason, muttered to himself, 'It must certainly be confessed that I cost my master dear!' Fix, without saying a word, looked at Mr. Fogg, and it would have been difficult to analyse the thoughts which struggled within him.

items.title:
YOU CAN DO IT
WE CAN HELP
items.author: John Doe
items.excerpt: 'Was that all you did? - just talk, talk, talk?' Hoo-Hoo demanded. 'Who  hunted your meat for you? and milked the goats? and caught the fish?' 'A sensible question, Hoo-Hoo, a sensible question. As I have told you,  in those days food-getting was easy. We were very wise. A few men got  the food for many men. The other men did other things.
